# Images of Divine Liturgy pamphlet for St Elizabeth's Orthodox Church

> Divine Liturgy - Orthodox Poulsbo Collection - Catechesis 2025

## The Proskomedia

- [p. 1 The Proskomedia](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182014.jpg) p.1 The Proskomedia

## Liturgy of the Catechumens

- [pp. 2 and 3 - The Great Litany](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182021.jpg) pp. 2-3 The Great Litany
- pp. 4 and 5 - needed (TBD)
- [pp. 6 and 7 - The Third Antiphon and Little Entrance](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182040.jpg) The Third Antiphon and Little Entrance
- [pp. 8 and 9 - Troparia and Kontakia](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182048.jpg) pp. 8 and 9, Troparia and Kontakia
- [pp. 10 and 11 - Troparion to St Elizabeth](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182055.jpg) Troparion to St Elizabeth the New Martyr
- [pp. 12 and 13 - Kontakion to St Elizabeth](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182101.jpg) Kontakion to St Elizabeth the New Martyr
- [pp. 14 and 15](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182107.jpg) The Trisagion
- [pp. 16 and 17 - Epistle and Gospel Readings](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182114.jpg) The Epistle, the Gospel, and the Litany of Fervent Supplication
- [pp. 18 and 19 - Litany for the Catechumens](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182121.jpg) pp. 18 and 19, Litany for the Catechumens
- [pp. 20 and 21 - Litanies of the Faithful](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182129.jpg)
- [pp. 22 and 23 - The Great Entrance](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/divineliturgy/20250929_182138.jpg) pp. 22 and 23, The Great Entrance

## The Liturgy of the Faithful (TBD)

TBD

## (optional) References

- [A series, _The Orthdox Faith_, by Protopresbyter Thomas Hopko](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith)

### Preface to _The Orthodox Faith_, by Protopresbyter Thomas Hopko

The Preface is written by His Beatitude, Metropolitan Tikhon
- [Preface](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/preface)

### Volume 1 - Doctrine and Scripture

Volume 1 contains four sections: sources of Christian Doctrine, main doctrines of the Orthodox Church present by way of commentary on the Nicene Creed, an explanation of the doctrine of the Holy Trinity, & an explanation on Scripture.

- [Volume 1 - Doctrine and Scripture](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture) Doctrine and Scripture

- [Sources of Christian Doctrine](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/sources-of-christian-doctrine) Sources of Christian Doctrine
- [The Symbol of Faith](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/the-symbol-of-faith) The Symbol of Faith (Creed)
- [The Holy Trinity](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/the-holy-trinity) The Holy Trinity
- [The Bible](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/the-bible) The Bible
- [Old Testament](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/old-testament) Old Testament
- [New Testament](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/new-testament) New Testament
- [Salvation History](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/salvation-history) Salvation History
- [Resources](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/doctrine-scripture/resources-vol1) Resources

### Volume 2 - Worship

Volume 2 contains 5 sections: the church building, the sacraments, daily cycles of prayer, the church year, and the Divine Liturgy.

- [Volume 2 - Worship](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship) Worship
#### The Church Building
- [The Church Building](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-church-building) The Church Building

#### The Sacraments
- [The Sacraments](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-sacraments) The Sacraments

#### The Daily Cycles of Prayer
- [The Daily Cycles of Prayer](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-daily-cycles-of-prayer) Daily Cycles of Prayer

#### The Church Year
- [The Church Year](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-church-year) The Church Year

#### The Divine Liturgy
- [The Divine Liturgy](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy) The Divine Liturgy

Subsections:

After an introduction, these cover the Divine Liturgy, section by section
- [The Divine Liturgy](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/the-divine-liturgy)
- [Prothesis](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/prothesis) Prothesis
- [Blessed is the Kingdom](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/blessed-is-the-kingdom)
- [Great Litany](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/great-litany) Great Litany
- [Antiphons](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/antiphons) Antiphons
- [Small Entrance](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/small-entrance) Small Entrance
- [Epistle](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/epistle) Epistle
- [Gospel](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/gospel) Gospel
- [Fervent Supplication](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/fervent-supplication) Fervent Supplication
- [Offertory: Great Entrance](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/offertory-great-entrance) Offeratory: Great Entrance
- [Love and Faith](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/love-and-faith) Love and Faith
- [Eucharistic Canon: Anaphora](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/eucharistic-canon-anaphora) Canon: Anaphora
- [Epiklesis](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/epiklesis) Epiklesis
- [Rememberances](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/rememberances) Rememberances
- [Our Father](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/our-father) Our Father
- [Communion](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/communion) Communion
- [Thanksgiving](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/thanksgiving) Thanksgiving
- [Benediction and Dismissal](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/the-divine-liturgy/benediction-and-dismissal) Benediction and Dismissal

#### Resources
- [Resources](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/worship/resources-vol2)

### Volume 3 - Church History

Volume 3, written by Protopresbyter Thomas Hopko and revised and expanded by Dr. David C. Ford, contains an in-depth look at church history through the centuries.

- [Volume 3 - Church History](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/church-history) Church History

First through Twentieth Centuries have their own links at the link.

### Volume 4 - Spirituality

Volume 4 deals with the main themes of Christian Life: prayer, fasting, repentance, the virtues, witness in the world, and communion with God.

- [Volume 4 - Spirituality](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality)

- [Orthodox Spirituality](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/orthodox-spirituality) Orthodox Spirituality
- [The Beatitudes](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/the-beatitudes)[The Beatitudes]
- [The Virtues](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/the-virtues) The Virtues
- [The Greatest Virtue is Love](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/the-greatest-virtue-is-love) The Greatest Virtue is Love
- [Prayer, Fasting, and Almsgiving](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/prayer-fasting-and-almsgiving) Prayer, Fasting, and Almsgiving
- [Sexuality, Marriage, and Family](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/sexuality-marriage-and-family) Sexuality, Marriage, and Family
- [Sickness, Suffering, and Death](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/sickness-suffering-and-death) Sickness, Suffering, and Death
- [The Kingdom of Heaven](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/the-kingdom-of-heaven) The Final Judgement, Heaven and Hell, The Kingdom of Heaven
- [Resources](https://www.oca.org/orthodoxy/the-orthodox-faith/spirituality/resources-vol4)
